nasha_snapshot_loading_error: An error occurred on retrieving the snapshots.
nasha_snapshot_set_success: The snapshot frequency modification will take effect shortly.
nasha_snapshot_set_success_fail: An error occurred when updating the snapshot intervals.
nasha_snapshot_informations: A snapshot is an instantaneous capture of the status of your NAS-HA, at the precise moment that the snapashot is taken.
nasha_snapshot_informations_size: Snapshots use up space on your partition in order to function properly. No snapshot history is saved: for snapshots of the same frequency, the last snapshot taken will overwrite the previous one.
nasha_snapshot_warning_frequency: If you do not select a duration, your existing snapshots for this partition will be deleted.
